title: Barista
description: A Barista is a self-service restaurant or institutional dining room. The food is prepared in advance and ready to grab.

title: Library
description: A library is a collection of books, and possibly other materials and media. Libraries provide physical or digital material.

title: Gym
description: A gym is a large room, usually containing special equipment, where people go to do physical exercise and get fit.

title: Chai Nagri
description: Chai Nagri has emerged as one of the most prominent brands in the Food and Beverage category with a wide variety of chai and delicious snack range for students.

title: Square One
description: You can obviously go to Square One, the canteen of Chitkara University, and get yourself something you likeâ€”grab and go, ready-to-eat food.

title: OIA
description: The Office of International Affairs (OIA) is designed to perform efficiently in defining an appropriate internationalisation policy, collaborating with International Universities.

title: Picasso
description: Design students get an edge with a strong foundation in fundamental Art & Design skills. A platform to enhance design skills.

title: Explore Hub
description: To nurture this startup culture, Chitkara University is coming out with a new and noble idea of EXPLORE HUB.

title: Explore Star
description: A blend of cultural ethnicity enfolding different creative genres will be displayed in this exquisite extravaganza.
